attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Worst app ever!!!! I downloaded it to stay up to date on news but then I realized all it is is a platform for a homophobic rapist to spew false truth to groups of idiots who support him. Bad app!!

attributes.title: ITS HORRIBLE!
attributes.review:
this is by far the worst app i’ve been to . not to mention the awful persons name in the title🤢🤢🤢. bruh bernie shouldve won !
we have a RAPIST & RACIST as our president & anyone who is a trump supporter is too stupid to realize that 😹

attributes.title: Awful experience
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and all i saw was racist propaganda & the perpetuation of immoral & inhuman content. Awful experience. Bad quality of app.

attributes.title: 🙅🏾‍♀️🙅🏾‍♀️🙅🏾‍♀️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can stand in solidarity with our amazing president but, unfortunately the app constantly crashes so it’s gonna be a 1 star for me.

attributes.title: Worst app✨
attributes.review: This app was incredibly slow and by far the worst app I downloaded. I’m so sorry for the people who Downloaded this app, may God be with you Cheeto supporters. 🙃✨🧚‍♀️💕

attributes.title: waste of time
attributes.review: the app said it would take 5 business days to download. it actually took 6 and a half business days. meanwhile, i’m sitting here waiting for this junk app to download i noticed this app was made for people who support trump. big mistake.. i rate trump supporters a 2/10. do not recommend.

attributes.title: The Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app was created by a cheeto who doesn’t have respect for women or black lives. If I could pick 0 stars I would l. Thank you for your time 😡

attributes.title: Made life difficult
attributes.review: I can’t I’ve never seen such a bad app before. Worst app in my entire life, disappointed.

attributes.title: Dont download
attributes.review: My phone glitched and i had to get a new phone then i reopen the app then roaches came and then i had to get a new house

attributes.title: Glitched App
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitches and I had to go to the apple repair shop and get it fixed. Don’t recommend
